properties.description: Set that slider is a form element               Value: slider
properties.name: _formElement

properties.description: Value of the element when the element is reseted, if will also be the value of the element if no value is provided
properties.name: default

properties.description: Slider range value align               Different depending the orientation of the slider               Vertical slider: center               Horizontal slider: center, left or right               Default: right
properties.name: displayAlign

properties.description: Slider range value position               Different depending the orientation of the slider               Vertical slider: top, bottom, left or right               Horizontal slider: top & bottom               Default: bottom
properties.name: displayPosition

properties.description: Slider range value visibility               Default: false
properties.name: displayVisibility

properties.description: Space that occupy the slider inside parent container.              By default, its size adapts to its content              Values can be: true or false              Default: true
properties.name: inline

properties.description: Slider maximum range value               Value must be an integer
properties.name: max

properties.description: Slider minimum range value               Value must be an integer
properties.name: min

properties.description: Slider orientation               Values can be: horizontal or vertical               Default: horizontal
properties.name: orientation

properties.description: Toggles the readonly status of the spinner               Default: false
properties.name: readonly

properties.description: Slider size respect to container               Value must be number percentage               Default: 50%
properties.name: size

methods.description: Functionality when interacting with the slider               Only for thumb interaction and click interaction on iOS devices
methods.name: _interactionSlider

methods.description: Slider thumb movement and update slider value
methods.name: _thumbMotion

methods.description: Updates slider current value and trigger onChange callback
methods.name: _updateCurrentValue

methods.description: Updates disabled status and activates the thumb motion when it is not disabled
methods.name: _updateDisabled

params.description: Whether the value key will be the private or the public one
params.name: privateValueKey

methods.description: Updates fill's height on vertical sliders
methods.name: _updateVerticalHeight

methods.description: Resets the value of the element to the default one, if no default is provided then empties the value
methods.name: reset
